story.title: The Story
story.subtitle: Born in 2024
story.description: Dilietta is the natural extension of the Dilia universe. A place to find the Italian cuisine we love every day: simple, generous, made with exceptional products.

menu.title: The Menu
menu.subtitle: Antipasti, pasta & dishes
menu.description: Every day, discover our morning-made antipasti, fresh pasta, daily specials and lunch formulas. Take away or enjoy on site.

products.title: Products
products.subtitle: Italian grocery
products.description: A curated selection of Italian products: olive oils, vinegars, dried pasta, preserves, charcuterie and cheeses from producers we know.

suppliers.title: Suppliers
suppliers.subtitle: Our producers
suppliers.description: We work directly with passionate Italian producers, selected for the quality of their products and their commitment.

catering.title: Catering
catering.subtitle: Events & receptions
catering.description: For your corporate events, weddings or private occasions, Dilietta offers a bespoke catering service, true to the spirit of Italian generosity.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Find us
contact.address: 27 rue de la Fontaine au Roi, 75011 Paris
